alert.note: Alert for Graves; Marshall (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 6:59AM EST until March 03 at 7:45AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Marshall County in western Kentucky... Northeastern Graves County in western Kentucky... * Until 645 AM CST. * At 559 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Lovelaceville to near Mayfield to near Lynnville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Benton, Calvert City, Brewers and Symsonia. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 20 and 29. Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 29 and 51. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
